description: The student should install Apache-Fineract-CN with the help of the mentor in Amazon and launch multiple the tool https://github.com/codesenberg/bombardier (it is a HTTP Rest stress tool, that can launch up to k requests) in order to create a chart about  Mifos Payroll api scalability. The chart should be published in mifos docs.
name: Scalability of Apache Fineract-CN Api.
